attributes.action: Stop increasing tax, both direct and indirect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you are aware the total tax every person in the UK pays is the highest since the 1980's. With the funds you presently raise you must be able to direct these funds more effectively. So please stop the continually rise in taxes. The general population are struggling to cope with the burden.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
